Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Chem-A11 (Synthetic AMPs, Chem-KVL analog, Val-rich, Leu-rich, XXE, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: designed, tandem repeat, Ala-scan, amino acid substitution

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.86%) toChem-KVLV: 29%, L: 29%, R=K: 14%.Activity: active against A. baumannii ATCC 17978 (MIC 32 ug/ml),  S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 4 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (MIC 64 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 32 ug/ml), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 32 ug/ml), and S. typhimurium clinical isolates (MIC 64 ug/ml).SARy: a change of G4 to A increased peptide activity against S. aureus only.
Literature Information.Author: Zhen B, Geng C, Yang Y, Liang H, Jiang Y, Li X, Ye G.2024
Literature Information.Reference: Bioorg Med Chem Lett. 2024 May 10:129794. doi: 10.1016/j.bmcl.2024.129794.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Systematic alanine and stapling mutational analysis of antimicrobial peptide Chem-KVL
